#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main(){
    ll t,n,i,m,count,a[100002];
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        sort(a,a+n);
        m=0;
        count=1;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(a[i]==a[i+1])
                count++;
            else{
                if(m<count)
                    m=count;
                count=1;
            }
        }
        cout<<m<<endl;
    }
}
